headline.main: When 'Doing Everything' Is Way Too Much

docs.abstract: He could never have imagined that we could keep his body going even while it was trying its hardest to die.
docs.snippet: He could never have imagined that we could keep his body going even while it was trying its hardest to die.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis emphasized the right to food as fundamental in a video address Saturday to 500 experts starting work on a wide-ranging document aimed at raising awareness and proposing solutions to issues including hunger, obesity and food waste.

headline.main: Pope Emphasizes Right to Food in Address to 500 Experts
headline.print_headline: Pope Emphasizes Right to Food in Address to 500 Experts

docs.snippet: Pope Francis emphasized the right to food as fundamental in a video address Saturday to 500 experts starting work on a wide-ranging document aimed at raising awareness and proposing solutions to issues including hunger, obesity and food waste.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the swampy frontlines of South Sudan's conflict, women spend hours pounding wild fruits, water lilies and grasses to feed their children, just two months after the harvest.

headline.main: Famine Threat to South Sudan if War Continues to Block Aid
headline.print_headline: Famine Threat to South Sudan if War Continues to Block Aid

docs.snippet: In the swampy frontlines of South Sudan's conflict, women spend hours pounding wild fruits, water lilies and grasses to feed their children, just two months after the harvest.

docs.lead_paragraph: Canada's highest court struck down a ban on doctor-assisted suicide for mentally competent patients with terminal illnesses Friday, declaring that outlawing that option deprives dying people of their dignity and autonomy.

headline.main: Canada Court Rules Doctors Can Help Ill Patients Die
headline.print_headline: Canada Court Rules Doctors Can Help Ill Patients Die

docs.snippet: Canada's highest court struck down a ban on doctor-assisted suicide for mentally competent patients with terminal illnesses Friday, declaring that outlawing that option deprives dying people of their dignity and autonomy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Investing to provide drinking water for 750 million people in poor nations who lack clean supplies makes clear economic sense with bigger than expected health benefits, World Bank estimates showed on Friday.

headline.main: Investments in Water in Poor Nations Give Big Benefits-World Bank
headline.print_headline: Investments in Water in Poor Nations Give Big Benefits-World Bank

docs.snippet: Investing to provide drinking water for 750 million people in poor nations who lack clean supplies makes clear economic sense with bigger than expected health benefits, World Bank estimates showed on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Los Angeles school food executive, who took salt and fat out of school meals and was praised by U.S. first lady Michelle Obama, has been removed from his job, officials said in a brief statement on Thursday.

headline.main: Celebrated Los Angeles School Food Executive Removed From Job
headline.print_headline: Celebrated Los Angeles School Food Executive Removed From Job

docs.snippet: A Los Angeles school food executive, who took salt and fat out of school meals and was praised by U.S. first lady Michelle Obama, has been removed from his job, officials said in a brief statement on Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: The DuPont Co. has named two new independent directors with experience in corporate turnarounds as it faces a proxy fight and breakup calls from activist investor Nelson Peltz.

headline.main: Dupont Names 2 New Directors as It Faces Proxy Fight
headline.print_headline: DuPont Names 2 New Directors as It Faces Proxy Fight

docs.snippet: The DuPont Co. has named two new independent directors with experience in corporate turnarounds as it faces a proxy fight and breakup calls from activist investor Nelson Peltz.

headline.main: A Deal That Could Reverse Pfizer's History of Value-Destroying Acquisitions

docs.abstract: The pharmaceutical giant’s $15 billion purchase of Hospira should bolster Pfizer’s own generics unit – and open the way for spinning it off, says Robert Cyran of Reuters Breakingviews.
docs.snippet: The pharmaceutical giant’s $15 billion purchase of Hospira should bolster Pfizer’s own generics unit – and open the way for spinning it off, says Robert Cyran of Reuters Breakingviews.

docs.abstract: For our Second Annual Student Editorial Contest, in which teenagers are invited to write on an issue they care about, we have gathered a list of 301 writing prompts that may help — an update to last year’s popular list of 200.
docs.snippet: For our Second Annual Student Editorial Contest, in which teenagers are invited to write on an issue they care about, we have gathered a list of 301 writing prompts that may help — an update to last year’s popular list of 200.

docs.lead_paragraph: Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Margaret Hamburg announced Thursday that she will step down next month after nearly six years overseeing the agency, which regulates products making up 25 percent of the U.S. economy. During her tenure the FDA undertook major efforts to improve food safety, regulate tobacco and improve reviews of drugs. Here's a look at some of those efforts:

headline.main: How Outgoing FDA Chief Oversaw Food, Drugs and Tobacco
headline.print_headline: How Outgoing FDA Chief Oversaw Food, Drugs and Tobacco
